user_query: I'm planning a trip to Europe and I want to stay updated on the latest climate change news. Can you provide me with the news from a specific source, like 'The Guardian'? Additionally, I'm interested in the latest world news from Google. Please fetch the news for me and keep me informed.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest climate change news from 'The Guardian'.
Fetch the latest world news from Google.
Combine the news from both sources and format them for user update.
